task.summary: Updated Board to display images instead of numbers, added cell selection
Added and improved moving and removing pieces; only lets a piece be moved if it's a valid move. Added castling Added turns
Update including themes, a menu and a refactor of general structure to avoid repetition.
Added Graveyard, pawn upgrade menu. Undo is shakey
